description: a linked EC2-Classic instance from a VPC. After the instance has been unlinked, the VPC security groups are no longer associated with it. An instance is automatically unlinked from a VPC when it's stopped.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance to unlink from the VPC.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC to which the instance is linked.

nested_items.name: Return
nested_items.description: Returns true if the request succeeds; otherwise, it returns an error.
